languages.text: "Я прошел через чертоги Черного корабля. Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} может быть увере{mf|н|на}, что мои творения не несут зла. Скажите, что вы желаете воплотить в камне?"
"I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"
languages.original_text: "Я прошел через чертоги Черного корабля. Звездн{mf|ый|ая} Госпо{mf|дин|жа} может быть увере{mf|н|на}, что мои творения не несут зла. Скажите, что вы желаете воплотить в камне?"

traits.locale_text: "I have passed the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"
"I have passed the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"
"I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"
"They are sanctioned, good sir. My celestial {mf|lord|lady} can be certain of my purity before the Imperium. The governor pays close attention to such things."
"I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"
"I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"
"I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"

languages.text: “我已经穿过了黑船的厅堂，来自上界的大人。您可以确信，我手中的造物没有一丝邪恶的印记。告诉我吧，您希望在您的雕像上看到什么？”
languages.original_text: "I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"

traits.locale_text: “我已经穿过了黑船的厅堂，来自上界的大人。您可以确信，我手中的造物没有一丝邪恶的印记。告诉我吧，您希望在您的雕像上看到什么？”

languages.text: «He sobrevivido a los corredores de la Nave Negra. Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial puede estar {mf|seguro|segura} de que mis creaciones no albergan ninguna maldad. Dígame, ¿qué quiere ver inmortalizado en piedra?».
languages.original_text: "I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"

traits.locale_text: «He sobrevivido a los corredores de la Nave Negra. Mi {mf|Señor|Señora} Celestial puede estar {mf|seguro|segura} de que mis creaciones no albergan ninguna maldad. Dígame, ¿qué quiere ver inmortalizado en piedra?».

languages.text: "Kara Gemi'nin salonlarından geçtim. Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, yaratımlarımın kötücül olmadığından emin olabilir. Söyleyin, neyin taşta şekil bulmasını istiyorsunuz?"
languages.original_text: "I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"

traits.locale_text: "Kara Gemi'nin salonlarından geçtim. Semavi {mf|Lordumuz|Leydimiz}, yaratımlarımın kötücül olmadığından emin olabilir. Söyleyin, neyin taşta şekil bulmasını istiyorsunuz?"

languages.text: 「わしは〈黒き御船〉のホールを通り抜けてきました。天の{mf|君|姫}なら、わしの創造物にはいかなる邪悪も宿していないと確信しているかもしれません。さて、お聞かせください。石にどのような姿を刻みたいのですか？」
languages.original_text: "I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"

traits.locale_text: 「わしは〈黒き御船〉のホールを通り抜けてきました。天の{mf|君|姫}なら、わしの創造物にはいかなる邪悪も宿していないと確信しているかもしれません。さて、お聞かせください。石にどのような姿を刻みたいのですか？」

languages.text: « J'ai arpenté les couloirs du Vaisseau Noir. Soyez {mf|certain|certaine}, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, que mes créations ne comportent pas une once de malveillance. Dites-moi, que voulez-vous voir retranscrit dans la pierre ? »
languages.original_text: "I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"

traits.locale_text: « J'ai arpenté les couloirs du Vaisseau Noir. Soyez {mf|certain|certaine}, Votre Céleste Seigneurie, que mes créations ne comportent pas une once de malveillance. Dites-moi, que voulez-vous voir retranscrit dans la pierre ? »

languages.text: "Ich habe die Hallen des Schwarzen Schiffs durchschritten. {mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin} kann sicher sein, dass meine Werke nichts böses in sich tragen. Sagt mir, was Ihr in Stein gemeißelt sehen wollt."
languages.original_text: "I have passed through the halls of the Black Ship. My Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady} may be certain that my creations bear no evil within them. Tell me, what do you wish to see shaped in stone?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe die Hallen des Schwarzen Schiffs durchschritten. {mf|Mein himmlischer Herr|Meine himmlische Herrin} kann sicher sein, dass meine Werke nichts böses in sich tragen. Sagt mir, was Ihr in Stein gemeißelt sehen wollt."
